text: He was FIVE HOURS LATE to a lunch that HE PLANNED and so wound up proposing to me outside our workplace 20 minutes before a meeting with a ring he'd bought on the way there with the last $50 in his account. I've worn it for 21 years and have no intention of ever taking it off.
